definition: wording (of a proposal)/formulation/viewpoint (on an issue)/(one of eight methods of bonesetting in TCM) restoring the part displaced by a fracture to its correct position by lifting
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: For the Big Three now read the Magnificent Seven.
sentences.chinese: 三大厂商的提法现在变为七强。

sentences.english: We find the village of Latifa littered with bomblets that haven't gone off yet.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现拉提法村布满未引爆的小炸弹。

sentences.english: This plausible suggstion is not accurate.
sentences.chinese: 这个似乎合理的提法是不准确的。

sentences.english: So Potiphar's wife told lies about Joseph so he ended up in prison.
sentences.chinese: 所以波提法的妻子撒谎导致约瑟坐监。

sentences.english: The very idea of a sixth form college was novel in 1962.
sentences.chinese: 第六学级学院在1962年还是新提法。

sentences.english: The idea that dams can change weather patterns is not new.
sentences.chinese: 大坝可以改变天气模式的提法并不新鲜。

sentences.english: This is not merely a matter of wording.
At present proposed the socialism new countryside has the obvious difference with beforehand formulation.
sentences.chinese: 目前所提出的社会主义新农村与以前提法有明显区别。

sentences.english: I think the proposition is invalid , and today I will try to refute it.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这个提法有问题，今日试驳议之。

sentences.english: Potiphar, an officer of Pharaoh's, the captain of the guard, an Egyptian.
sentences.chinese: 有个埃及人普提法尔，是法郎的内臣兼卫队长。

sentences.english: Using Armillaria mellea as material, polysaccharide was extracted by hot water.
sentences.chinese: 以山榛蘑为原料，采用热水浸提法提取山榛蘑多糖。

sentences.english: On whether there can be further discussion of certain formulations involving the line of the Party's Eleventh Congress.
sentences.chinese: 涉及党的十一大路线一些提法的问题是否可以讨论？

sentences.english: I never heard anything more ingenious than your suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没有听见过象你这样有独创性的提法。

sentences.english: I hope I've added some strength to the claim.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的论述为这个提法增添了说服力。

sentences.english: Crude polyphenol oxidase (PPO) in Pingguoli pear fruits was prepared through sequential steps of homogenization followed by extraction with acetone.
sentences.chinese: 采用匀浆后丙酮抽提法从苹果梨中提取多酚氧化酶。

definition: to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
